title: Bug 109718 - Large content in text item results in single-line tips
description: When saving a text item with a large content and placing the mouse pointer over it, the expected behavior is that the tips show the content in the intended format. However, the actual behavior is that the tips show the content in a single line.
OB: Upon saving a text item with a substantial amount of content and hovering the mouse pointer over it, the tips are displayed as a single line.
EB: The expected behavior is that the tips should display the content in the intended format rather than as a single line.
SR:
1. Create a text item with a large amount of content.
2. Save the text item.
3. Place the mouse pointer over the text item to view the tips.
